dcterms:description: MS-MARCO datasets are large datasets designed for different information retrieval tasks. This dataset contains 3.2 million documents and provides relevance scores for every pair of queries and documents.
dcterms:title: MS-MARCO

dcterms:creator: Nick Craswell
Daniel Campos
Bhaskar Mitra
Emine Yilmaz
Bodo Billerbeck
dcterms:description: ORCAS is a click-log based dataset that uses Indri to retrieve 100 documents for every search. The clicks are used to evaluate these ranking results.
dcterms:title: ORCAS

dcterms:description: The human-in-the-loop (HITL) dataset is an interactive search dataset from a CLIR project. Volunteers select relevant sentences from the top 10 documents as feedback.
dcterms:title: HITL1

dcterms:creator: Siddhant Garg
Thuy Vu
Alessandro Moschitti
dcterms:description: ASNQ is a high-quality natural language dataset for answer sentence selection, consisting of 59914 questions.
dcterms:title: ASNQ

dcterms:creator: Diane Kelly
Jimmy Lin
dcterms:description: ciQA is a web-based dataset for training interactive question answering, containing 30 topics.
dcterms:title: ciQA
